column4: what/where should i change this to
apt-get update dies on the same thing
apparently this is because fiesty now longer is update
why do repositories for older versions of ubuntu just get deleted with no way to update anymore?
this is absurd that it just dies and i can't update
i thought i would be able to upgrade without wiping and reinstalling?
why isn't that run automatically on updates?
that is what i tried to using originally
there is one other thing you could try, but it may not go smoothly
last resort - chnage every instance of fiesty to hardy in /etc/apt/sources.list then   apt-get dist-upgrade
that sounds like it will cause even more problems
